attributes.action: Suspend all benefits for illegal migrants including hotels & housing
attributes.additional_details: Illegal migration places an increasing burden on already stretched public services—including housing, healthcare, and social support—and is contributing to growing public frustration, especially among taxpayers who are facing rising living costs, cuts to services, and extended waiting times for essential provisions such as NHS care and council housing. The government is currently spending around £8million per day housing these individuals in hotels.

rejection.details:
The requests made by this petition are already covered by several open petitions, including: 

Stop benefits and free healthcare for immigrants who have not worked in the UK 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716399

Shut the migrant hotels down now and deport illegal migrants housed there
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718406

Do not house illegal migrants in private rentals, deport them immediately
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726409
